page.title: 17PARISH NEWS
page.content:
{Parish News. The united parishes as mentioned on page 1 have no Vicar of their own at this date.The organisation of this post is under review-the parishoners await the decision eagerly.The graph shows a % of those interviewed on their use of the village churches.
{++++++++++ xxxxxxxxxx ~~~~~~~ {++++++++++ xxxxxxxxxx ~~~~~~~ {++++++++++ xxxxxxxxxx {++++++++++ xxxxxxxxx {+++ users non-users occasional
There is no variety in the local faiths.One Jewish family,one Born- Again Christian family otherwise they are all nominally Church of England taken from the sample.
